The Argo NetCDF files format checker was updated on June 18th 2025.  
You may receive new warnings on the metadata file (the project_name long_name attribute will be revisited).  
More information on [https://github.com/OneArgo/ArgoFormatChecker/releases/tag/v2.9.0](https://github.com/OneArgo/ArgoFormatChecker/releases/tag/v2.9.0){target="_blank"}
